title: An Energy-Efficient Tellurium Electrode Enabled by Cs2TeI6 Perovskite Structure for Durable Aqueous Zn-Te Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02916J, Paper
Jinye Li, Chengjun Lei, Pengjie Jiang, Chen Xu, Tingting Liu, Xiao Liang
Tellurium (Te) is a promising high-capacity electrode material for aqueous zinc-ion batteries, capable of multi-electron redox reactions. However, the inherent hydrolysis of oxidized Te4+ exhibits significant polarization during redox, rendering...
